summary:
Removes Seranas hood.
For real guys
descriptionHtml:
I figured this out while making a mod to wear Serana\'s hood and figured I would upload it for all you people that don\'t like the hood.
It might let her helmets as well.

Link to my mod to wear the hood for reals
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21874

Note: Having issues uploading pictures :(
-Thanks to SamuraiSquall for submitting the current picture!
author: RonnocDa
